headline: Luggage Start-upâ€™s Ex-Chief Is Returning as Its Co-Chief
abstract: Former employees of the luggage start-up told a tech website that Steph Korey had created a toxic culture. She stepped aside. But now, she says that was a mistake.
lead_paragraph: She apologized for her management style and stepped down as chief executive. Now, she says it was a mistake to fall on her sword and is taking her job back.
